website_summaries.verdict: A quality set of snowflake cookie cutters with varying shapes and sizes to make each cookie unique.
pros: 5-piece set comes with snowflakes in various shapes and sizes
Set priced at a low price point
Cutters sit inside of each other for easy storage
cons: Sometimes hard to remove cookie dough from the smaller snowflakes

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Waaay smaller than expected. I should have read the sizing more closely, but I'm sure I'll find some way to use them. Size comparison to an average drink coaster in pic.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Used and not sized as described!
customer_reviews.text: Did not even open the package. They are obviously used, one side the sticker has been reattached and there is a piece of dough or something on the largest triangle. Also the description states that they range from 1 3/4" - 3 3/4" when they actually range from 2" - 5 1/4". Only the smallest two are usable for what I bought then for , if I could even use them, which I cannot risk having celiac disease. The outside of the package also had crumbs that came off when handling it, so now my kitchen counter is possibly contaminated with gluten. Thanks a lot! Seriously not happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Not all the edges are even
customer_reviews.text: On a few of my cutters the bottom edge is not even and makes them difficult to use. I'm planning on using a dremmel to file down the high spots because otherwise they're great, but if you, like me, use these on finniky things like fondant and gum-paste, you may end up hating that. The sizes are as described and the construction is solid though so not a complete loss
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This set of hexagon cutters were great for making multiple batches of sugar cookies. The cutters seem very durable, even when squeezing the sides the cutters will not warp. As a plus, all six of the cutters are all neatly packed in a tin for easy storage. The cutters all seemed durable and sharp enough to cut through cookie dough with ease. I will definitely consider buying more of these cookie cutters in the future!
customer_reviews.author: RobPlease

customer_reviews.title: So easy. Seems like sturdy quality materials and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I wanted a small star to use for pie crust when making tartlets, but it turned out I needed one a bit larger than expected. Having multiple sizes allowed me to make a quick switch. I’ve also used them for cutting pie crust stars as designs. So easy. Seems like sturdy quality materials and I love the package with the nesting stars for storage. Looking forward to using them for cookies too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin J

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: I've used one of the cookie cutter sizes once, and I'm really happy with this product so far. The range of sizes is great because I'll have another size on hand to scale either up or down depending on the end product I'm seeking--and I can mix and match sizes within a batch if I'm feeling adventurous (I know, I need to get out more). The tin to keep them all together is a great touch for compact storage when they are not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia

customer_reviews.title: Used for polymer clay
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape size and selection. My only beef is where the metal ends come together it affects the outline of what you cut out and misshapens it (you need to both trim and try to smooth and dent). Most noticeable on the large tear drop and small diamond cutters.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Listen to the bad reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: Package came intact. Opened the mailer and found the product had been opened and was missing 4 pieces. The small round cutter was a complete oval shape. Very disappointed and it's not worth the trouble of returning since I have to drive several cities away, find parking and walk several blocks to do it. Don't even bother buying this product. Sounds very hit or miss based on the reviews. I had hoped I would be fortunate....but I shouldn't have even bothered purchasing these😡😡😡😤😤😤😤😤😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Tara Scott

customer_reviews.title: You really can't go wrong with Ateco cutters
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake ONCE of buying a FoxRun set of cutters, they were terrible. These are awesome and work like a charm. The metal isn't overly thin and fragile. I love that they're double sided. Please note that the corners are rounded even on the non-scalloped side so if you're looking for a sharp-cornered square, you should look at a different set.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda R

customer_reviews.title: Would 100% recommend and repurchase if needed
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome, and I’m so glad I finally have a set of hexagon cutters. It comes with pretty much every size you could ever need or want, and the point where the metal is crimped together is in the perfect spot on every cutter, so that it doesn’t effect the cookie shape at all.
customer_reviews.author: CRichards

customer_reviews.title: Ateco Geometric Shape Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I use these to cut out clay when creating miniatures. They are okay for the most part, but some of the shape cutters do leave a ridge at the point where the metal comes together to form to shape. With clay, I am able to just use sandpaper to smooth out the shape. Some of the shape cutters I have do not leave the ridge, I think that it just depends on how they were made. All in all, these have been very helpful and I think they were a great price.
customer_reviews.author: rebeck

customer_reviews.title: sizes aren't right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in the hope of using them to make tesselated patterns on pottery, but the sizes of the individual pieces are too variably, and so the range of patterns you can make is quite limited.
customer_reviews.author: literate crime novel buff

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cutters. I’m using for polymer clay. Good assortment in a nice storage container. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: What you expect from Ateco
customer_reviews.text: These work fine (as expected). Nice to get a set of multiple sizes rather than buying individual cutters. Ateco makes good quality products. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael GrantTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: They come in a nice can
customer_reviews.text: I used Ateco product before they last, I never ever had to replace a set I bought I have all my Ateco sets I bought through the years. The can the sets come in are nice and they last
customer_reviews.author: samer

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN FEW USES
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 3 times and they all broke (for cereal treats). I bought them even though they broke, bc for a while I couldn't find anything sturdier. But then I found these: Ateco 5703 9-Piece Fluted Cutter Set, Square  Those are much better!!!! And they do not break. DO NOT BUY THESE, DO YOURSELF A FAVOR AND BUY THE BLUE ATECO CUTTERS
customer_reviews.author: Reezus

customer_reviews.title: Well made cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great set of graduated plaque cookie cutters. Very sturdy and well made. Hand wash and allow to dry completely before storing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these graduated shapes! Use them all the time in my leather earring designs.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Wehrlie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small shapes!
customer_reviews.text: I use these with clay in my pottery studio and they are so handy and useful! They work great for so many different projects and they are easy to clean up and store. Perfect little helpers. :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Hastings

customer_reviews.title: Loved the different sizes and the packaging!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved these star cutouts!!! Easy to use and clean and loved the different sizes!!!
customer_reviews.author: MomMomJan

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my ceramics art!
customer_reviews.text: I use these alot when making ceramic projects. I make lots of sculptures...this makes it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wenkel

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected didn’t work for clay molds cut outs but I’m sure it will work for actuall cookies
customer_reviews.author: Karina Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to make pie decorations. Love the different sizes, easy to clean and best of all, super cute container to keep everything nice and neat. LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: SoCitySandie

customer_reviews.title: not perfectly square
customer_reviews.text: These are not perfectly square. I'm using them to make square coasters out of clay, so I have to be careful how I line the cutter up. They also leave a jag in the clay, where the metal overlaps. That said, the cutters feel heavy duty enough to last quite some time in my clay studio. I even feel comfortable letting the elementary school kids I teach use them.
customer_reviews.author: porcelain

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: These are good for the price. They’re not perfect. I use the circle a lot and the metal cutter has an overlapping piece that comes out in the clay and I have to sand it down after baking. The circles never come out perfect but they pass...
customer_reviews.author: Kandee

customer_reviews.title: Very good item since it is the correct shape to have ...
customer_reviews.text: these are the exact right shape so that I can utilize all the dough rolled out for cookies or crackers, unlike a circle. Very good item since it is the correct shape to have no waste. Nothing fancy - just an old fashioned typical cookie cutter. Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Tait

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for potters!
customer_reviews.text: These have never touched anything in my kitchen. I make pottery here in the foothills of North Carolina and use these guys all the time.
customer_reviews.author: abbyeb

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter set !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cutters ! I can’t wait to whip up a batch of cookie dough & use thuds this weekend !!! Great buy, great quality too !
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Not Ateco's Best Cutters
customer_reviews.text: Points are rounded not sharp. I was expecting a "pointed" triangle. They cut fine but to get the sharp points you need to take an extra step and "cut" them to a sharp point. The largest cutter was "bent" along the straight edge.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good that it came with multiple size and shape,value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lim

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for fondant pieces for a wedding cake. Cut with ease and the quality is great! I have bought other cutters from this company and have not been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cut very clean
customer_reviews.text: Very nice qulity this is my second set I love them
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: A good American apple pie
customer_reviews.text: A good American apple pie, with stars and strips. For the pie in the park festival. On the Fourth of July in our town. Best of show with these stars. Worth every piece of pie, that the baked dough stars sat on.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for cookies. You can’t return
customer_reviews.text: It was to big fir what I wanted it for but good as cookie cutters. You can’t return soake sure it’s really what you want
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cutters that did not rust at ALL after washing
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set for many uses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect set for many uses! First use was cutting apple slices into stars for sangria - yum! Worked great, can't wait to use them for other things - especially around Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: D. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Odd size variations
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are great for detail work and cutting intricate shapes on pies or cookies. But it's interesting that the cutters aren't really proportionate to one another. For instance, the smallest circle cutter is still about 1/3" bigger than the smallest square cutter. It's not a problem, they just aren't all as dainty as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: cocade27

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the diamond shaped cutter set from the Amazon Warehouse (second hand items) at 10.47 and am extremely pleased with what I received. Item is as described, set of 8 diamond shaped cutters ranging from 1 inch to 4.5 inch made from stainless steel. I'm using them to cut out diamond shapes for a harlequin design for a masquerade ball cake and these will do great! Thank you Amazon.com!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon76

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the top-of-the-line cookie cutters, but I love the convenient case they come in. I have used them for cookies, tea sandwiches, and brownies and everything comes out well. The cutting edge is thin and sharp enough to get through layers of sandwich. The top is just slightly thicker metal, so if you have to press hard, it will dig into your hands. They definitely get the job done and are fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: slandmesser

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters
customer_reviews.text: This cutters have a nice sharp edge and are great for cutting fondant, gumpaste, modeling chocolate, etc. I love that they come in a container that keeps them all together in one place. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: TheWitch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cutters
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this product is each cutter is good for cutting clay. The only negative thing, is its difficult to get the pieces all back into the container.
customer_reviews.author: ros

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: Use it to make different shaped pancakes for the grandkids when they come tom visit.
customer_reviews.author: John Rydzewski

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy and good quality. This is the second Ateco cookie cutter set I own. Couldn't go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: Zubair Valimohideen

customer_reviews.title: Not my cup of Tea! Way Too Small! Very Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this, how could anyone even make a cookie with this item? Way Too Small
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Propst

customer_reviews.title: Using for fondant
customer_reviews.text: So far like how the feel and look. Bought them to use along with fondant. Think it will workout great for that. Can’t wait to use them! Only thing so far the lid for the case doesn’t stay on very well, easily comes off.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Metal is bent
customer_reviews.text: They're fine I guess but they came bent. Doesn't really work well for geometric shapes...
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality. I use them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Dpg

customer_reviews.title: cut very clean
customer_reviews.text: the awesome cutter cuts fondant and cookie dough good for baking and decorating
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect hexagon.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for making some hexagonal game pieces and discovered only too late that these are not perfectly hexagonal. If you need something that is hexagonal look elsewhere. If you just want something with six sides they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: electricquad

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool for Cake Decorators
customer_reviews.text: I had been waiting for this item to come into one of my cake supply shops but decided to go ahead and order it on Amazon. The cutters came in record time and are so precise. I know the edges of my fondant will be crisply cut if I use an Ateco product. Sure beats plastic cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

customer_reviews.title: the finer detailed cutters are useless
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, the finer detailed cutters are useless. You can't remove the dough. These require painstaking work.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Y McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice edges
customer_reviews.text: My stars came out with a very clean professional look
customer_reviews.author: Dee so

customer_reviews.title: fun stars, nest nicely
customer_reviews.text: The gradated shapes are exactly what I needed for craft classes. We used them for needle felting shapes for accessories and the sharp side was still ok for flipping over to felt the other side safely. I also plan to use them as templates, drawing, and maybe even cookies. The accompanying tin is perfect for storage (although a clear lid would have been nice to see at a glance what was inside), and they nest nicely, making it easy to identify any missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: KDL

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Used these to make my wedding cookies for favor AND place setting.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased...fourth of July cookies in the planning stage
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Looks sturdy. I always enjoy my Ateco tools. It's designed nicely and I know there will be no problems with dough jamming up in the narrow parts.
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: love different sized cutters
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I make pan cookies to cut squares for icing. I simply throw it in the dishwasher and close the door. No rust like some.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and love the assorted sizes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and love the assorted sizes. The biggest was about 6 inches wide and smallest was 1 1/2inches wide. I used them for a 3 tiered cake that needed gumpaste snowflakes of different sizes
customer_reviews.author: MaryLou Gallegos Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good item but little one is really little, we use 2 of the 3
customer_reviews.text: Good item for cookies. The little one is REALLY little but the middle and biggest ones we used a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen L. Henschen

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and a good price. Was exactly what I was looking for. The wash up well also. Not the flimsy, thin cutters that lose their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Luanne Lobdell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little sets. I ordered the round cutters too. Perfect for fondant cake decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I needed them for a special order that was requested. The cookies came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: Judynana

customer_reviews.title: Nice hexagon cutter set.
customer_reviews.text: These are stainless steel, which I like, but could not find on the description of this product. I like the various sizes although I may not use all of them. They all nest in the container so they stay together without getting bent. I use these for biscuits & rolled cookies.You can cut out these in a pattern without the waste you have using a round cutter, that you have to reroll, saving time.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for biscuits and scones
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for biscuits and scones!! Ateco has great products that last we use them in our bakery and at home!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer!
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly as I expected and make great graham crackers!
customer_reviews.author: Soaplady123

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver and produces better biscuits
customer_reviews.text: Reduces the need to re-roll the dough, which toughens some biscuits. Can get more biscuits from a given roll-out of dough. I've since noticed that commercial "biscuits in a can" use the same hexagon approach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ateco 8 Piece Stainless Steel Diamond Shaped
customer_reviews.text: I use the cirlce set from Ateco and they are GREAT!!! Wouldn't do without them! So happy with Ateco products that I purchased the diamond set and it works just as well!! I use it as a perfect diamond imprint and it comes with multiple sizes, so I'm not restricted to one size. Great job!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelas Cakes & Fruit Arrangements

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a friend, she was super happy with the packaging and the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Beki Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Get for writing
customer_reviews.text: I love this shape. I use either Fondant/Gum Paste or modeling chocolate and flatten - cut out using these shapes and place a toothpick in them - write my message and stick in the cakes. Looks very classy.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Larger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: These are a little bit larger than what I was expecting. I wanted to be able to make my own cheese its and I can with these, they just are not bit sized.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cutters
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing these cookie cutter... I am glad I did they were perfect for cutting my clay...
customer_reviews.author: Trudesa Daniels

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest geometric cutters for the money that I have seen. The assortment of sizes and shapes is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, exactly as advertised. Shipping was quick, product safely packaged to avoid damage. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: BJ A.

customer_reviews.title: I love these cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: I love these cookie cutters, just wish the largest one was a little larger, maybe it said the size in the description & I just didn't pay attention. I still love them & had so much fun cutting watermelon stars for the 4th of July!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Lemon "stars"!
customer_reviews.text: So pleased! Perfect for what I need to make unique lemon stars -:) (lemon bars)
customer_reviews.author: Mmagic

customer_reviews.title: these are great quality and I used them to decorate pies for ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great quality and I used them to decorate pies for a 4th of july pie contest! I like the graduated sizing and the storage tin for organization.
customer_reviews.author: the bakerlady

customer_reviews.title: Threw everything else away
customer_reviews.text: I love the cutter set. The square cutters cut down on wasted efforts to re-roll the dough when making buscuits. I can cut all the dough the first time. Everyone loves my square buscuits. I threw all my round cutters away!
customer_reviews.author: goofster53

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - can't wait to use these. Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: lemoncrush

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: love them, they cut clay easily and the sizes are lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: tomosia

customer_reviews.title: Good set ...but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Ateco produts. However, the set I got was slightly warped. It was not caused by the shipping but can from the factory that way. I called Ateco about it and they simply sent me a replacement set.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar and Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it should work fine for cookies
customer_reviews.text: I was using this to cut sandwich. sometimes it sticks to it. also the it is not big enough to cut around the crust of the sandwich. Otherwise it should work fine for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: R. O.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! This is such a great addition to my other sets. I'm currently in culinary school and everybody wants thus set and even the Chef instructors. Made great and some fore doing tapas side.
customer_reviews.author: GRFJr

customer_reviews.title: Love that there is a variety of sizes as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that there is a variety of sizes as I make rolled out sugar cookies and I can even stack one on top of the other.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Mosley

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to have
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these for quite a long time so was happy to receive them. Surely are helpful when working my polymer clay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Stainless hexagon cutters...they do what they're designed to and they appear to be well made. Becareful after you heat them...they get deceptively hot.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Gedo

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well-made set with numerous shapes. Easy to use and to store. They should last forever as they are made of a material that doesn't rust.
customer_reviews.author: Bazza

customer_reviews.title: These are sturdy made and when I am not using them for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy made and when I am not using them for biscuits, my wife is planning on using them for homemade soap modes
customer_reviews.author: Harold G. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Makes my work easy...no more measuring.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Just what I've been looking for my ceramic studio. Makes work so much easier without measuring. Delivered earlier than expected. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: These are a lot smaller then I expected, but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a lot smaller then I expected, but they work well. The biggest circle is about 1.5 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little set, perfectly shaped cut outs in the shapes you want.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great for my fondant designs!
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed for some fondant shapes. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because they are kinda flimsy, but they will be fine to use for fondant!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Forthun

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy well made and great. I like the many sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Delores

customer_reviews.title: Cookie Lady
customer_reviews.text: After trying to find a square cutter in town, Amazon came through for me. The double sided cutter with various sizes makes it so much easier to bake my kolacky with all uniformed sizes. Who says sugar cookies have to be round? If you are a baker, you need this in your collection of cutters.
customer_reviews.author: SillyGoose

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product really helps reduce time when using the cutters to push through cookie dough. Yes, you will have to stop and clean, but I experienced that I can cut through 10-12 cookies when dough is 1/4th thick before cleaning. Luv these cutouts!
customer_reviews.author: Mzova

customer_reviews.title: Now these are good cookie cutters and are as described
customer_reviews.text: Now these are good cookie cutters and are as described. I may never use the biggest one, but so what.
customer_reviews.author: holmstead

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a perfect hexagon, don't get this. I wanted a very accurae hexagon but these are close but not perfect
customer_reviews.author: lees

customer_reviews.title: Snowflakes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these cookie cutters to create snowflake Christmas ornaments--they turned out so pretty it would have been a shame to see them eaten!
customer_reviews.author: At Shar's Place...

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item and not able to return
customer_reviews.text: I order a hexagon set what received is one round one I'm so not happy I spent $11 on one stupid cookie cutter that isn't even what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Nahorodny

customer_reviews.title: My favorite cookie cutters!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great trio of cutters! The construction is very, very well made. Other tin cutters bent with pressure but these do not. I plan on seeing if they have other shapes for purchase - I adore these!
customer_reviews.author: PAJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cuuters
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased to help my wife make fondant cutouts for her cake business. They came quickly and worked and have held their shape perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: All the main shapes are in there.
customer_reviews.text: I love that all the main shapes are here. They're small, but that comes in handy. For making the smaller details.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Burgess

product_meta.title: Ateco Plain Edge Snowflake Cutter Set in Assorted Shapes & Sizes, Stainless Steel, 5 Pc Set
product_meta.description: Size:Plain Edge| Style:SnowflakesSet of five cutters. Each cutter has a distinct shape and size that enable them to nest into storage tin. Cutters range from 1 1/2 inch to 5 inch. Made of stainless steel. By Ateco. Since 1905, Ateco has supplied fine restaurants and bakeries with quality built, specialty baking tools. Ateco products are internationally renowned for their high quality. When you use Ateco products, you’re not only enjoying quality craftsmanship, you’re also enjoying quality design; the products are a result of over one hundred years and four generations of innovation and development.
